channel.title: Sbomify
channel.description: Your Security Artifact Hub. From zero to SBOM hero. Generate, manage, and share SBOMs and compliance documents. Built for CRA compliance and seamless integration with your existing tools.

item.title: sbomify GitHub Action v0.3.0: Now Faster and Compatible with GitLab!
item.description:
We’re excited to announce the release of version 0.3.0 of our GitHub Actions module!

This update brings some valuable enhancements, including:

  • GitLab support: Responding to popular demand, you can now use our sbomify toolkit with GitLab, making it easier than ever to integrate SBOM generation into your GitLab CI/CD workflows. Check out the details here.
  • Improved speed: We’ve optimized the toolchain to reduce build times by 50% or more, even on high-performance servers.
  • Bug fixes: This release includes fixes for issues encountered when building SBOMs from Docker images, ensuring a smoother experience.
